caption: The owner is very kind and hard working. Our food was out in no time, and everything tasted and looked wonderful. He uses biodegradable material for all utensils and packaging. Amazing place! Please check it out.

Apparently Piper's won't be serving a full menu after 3 weeks from now which is disappointing as this is my first time eating here but I will keep coming back when they transition to a more ice cream and frozen treat place because the man who took care of us was so kind and the quality of their food is so high you know they are committed to serving the best product possible at a fair price. My frittata is exceptional. Go Piper's!!

Got a brat. Very good. The dude said they put mustard, onions and relish on them. I just got the mustard. Turns out the relish is sauerkraut. If I had known that I would of gotten it. Next time I will get the "relish" sauerkraut.

This is a nice cafe. I went here to get some ice cream and was satisfied with my experience. I walked up here and ordered a toffee ice cream. The guy working made it from scratch very quick, so I got it soon. I got my ice cream and walked away because I was eating my ice cream while walking. It tasted very good, and I will definitely come here to get ice cream again. I gave this cafe five stars because they have great ice cream.
Love this place BUT the hours are the worst. If they were open every night I would be there.
The ice cream and service is always top notch. The regular food is, sadly, usually lacking.
Love it!
Very friendly, neat place. We only had ice cream but it was quick and reasonable. We'll be back.
Was good
i miss this place and their endless amounts of different flavor ice creams
Great homemade food from their bread to their jams to their amazing ice cream. Very reasonable prices and great service.

My husband and I love Piper's! I am so thankful that the owner has vegan and gluten free options and all of the food I've had there is so delicious. He takes pride in preparing his food and choosing quality ingredients.
They have the BEST iced coffee and their prices are cheaper than the big chain coffee spots.

Rating only for bulk takeout soft serve, but OMG how delicious! The ability to pick your own flavors and basically build your custom soft serve can't be beat! Will definitely return to try more of the menu!!
Piper's never disappoints!  Wonderful outdoor decor along with excellent food and friendly service.
AMAZING!!!! If I lived in the area this would be my go to place to get ice cream!!
Breakfast options available.
They even make their own sodas from scratch and they’re good too😋
Food is excellent, and they make the best milkshakes in the city!
My daughter loves to come here for the ice cream! They have tons of different flavors and it's not expensive at all.
Poor service very poor very rude never recomend .

Delicious! Just grabbed breakfast carryout and it was so fresh and tasty. Both the Goetta Frittata Wrap & Pork Sausage Sandwich were wonderful. Loved the fresh salsa and homemade Ketchup too. Rat Tail Fries & Hash Potatoes were so skinny and spot on! Very friendly staff, fast prep, and easy ordering. They also have a beautiful garden patio for outdoor dining. Overall, Piper's was an excellent experience. Thank you guys and keep up the great work. 👌

We have been doing a lot of carry out and Piper’s by far had the best experience!! Super friendly, ALL containers and bag were 100% compostable and they asked before giving us utensils to see if we really needed them. 👍 It was guilt-free carry out. Not to mention the food was delicious! We will be back!

Pipers has been AWESOME especially during quarantine! One of the few places in Cincy offering vegan options that’s still accessible and all their takeout material is compostable or biodegradable!!! An earth lover’s dream!!

At the moment  you arrive in this restaurant  the waiters give you a good feeling. Very hospitable crew, it is a friendly restaurant to  enjoy with friends or with your date. yummy  cooking, talented  chef de cuisine, reasonable  cost and courteous  service. Highly recommended.
Amazing breakfast
This spot never disappoints. They have good food for affordable pricing, there are no long waits even when the place is packed.
The food was amazing. I loved the spreads they’ve got. The omelette was great. Service was awesome. It’s a small quiet neighbourhood place.
They got breakfast sandwiches!
Great food
Yummy as always
The customer service is consistently quick, lovely atmosphere, helpful employees. Will eat here again when I arrive here.

This place is my number one place.  Of all restaurants I know I prefere it most. I always suggests to my friends to go to visit this restaurant. Whenever  I feel like having a decent lunch, this restaurant comes straight to my head. fresh and varied  food and a large menu.professional team, and great spirit. In addition to that, the tariff is modest. I suggest this place with no doubt.

The owner is super professional, strictly devoted to his creations! Nothing but delicious food, that is loaded with love & respect for flavors! I will return whenever I'm in Covington!  Hamelin burger and Rat tail fries plus housemade balsamic ketchup! Had Mulled Spiced Cider!

I was recommended here by my best friend and her family. The variety of ice cream is adequate. I always get a strawberry, raspberry, & lemon shake. It reminds me of fruity pebbles. The drink it’s self is smooth.
Loved the food and the service!  Surprising menu with excellent choices to please everyone!  Bravo!
Great healthy sandwiches, wide array of ice creams, cool looking little shop

We only had the ice cream, but it was good and cheap too! My husband mixed white chocolate with black cherry and I'll be getting that next time. Wonderful treat if you have kids bc the park is right there and a kids ice cream is only $1!
This place is fantastic. It was the best breakfast burrito I’ve ever had and the staff is great. I can’t wait to go back

Came on a slow Tuesday afternoon after my chiropractors appointment looking for a quick bite. I saw this close by on Google Maps and thought the chili shown in some pictures looked pretty stellar. I came up and order a medium-rare burger, a side of chili, and a homemade sarsaparilla. I was blown away. The burger was juicy and cooked to perfection based on my preference, and the chili was as good as I’d hoped from the picture references! The homemade soda is insane! This restaurant has made me want to emigrate to the neighborhood and have this place on speed dial at a moments notice! I’ll be coming back again after my next appointment for sure.
Great service and food!

Pipers is such a cute place. The gluten free French toast was so delicious and reasonably priced. The worker(who I assume is the owner) is very friendly and knowledgeable. I will certainly be back. Looking forward to trying more of the items.

We walked up and were surprised to order from a window at what appeared to be a hot dog stand on a Sunday morning.  So glad we stayed. Breakfast scrambler is so good. Biscuits amazing. I actually wrapped half of my biscuit in a napkin and put it in my purse. Lol. I am not into leftovers but these are too too good to waste. Strawberry preserves were perfectly sweet.  I am so impressed and will eat here next year when we are back for my birthday. They are proud of their food and absolutely should be. Very good quality and very savory food.
Ice cream was delicious
Terrific little hot dog spot. Outdoor seating available and venue is relaxing. Hot dogs, especially bread, is delicious. Ice cream is solid. Prices reasonable.
For the group of 11 people service was good. Servings were small.

A pack of Canadians stumbled upon this place during morning 1 of our ~week long visit to watch all the baseball; see Iron Maiden, Gojira, and Slipknot; and ride all the roller coasters. We came back two more times, because the food was wholesome and delicious (no HFCS allowed!) and the service was top-notch (open on Mondays! Unlike the rest of the city!)  To be honest I’m glad this place isn’t near where I live because I’d get so fat on daily milkshakes and sparkling lemonade.  Thanks for putting up with us!
Awesome food 👍 especially if you have food allegergies, very accommodating :)
Amazing food, menu, and service. I highly recommend this place.
I love this place! Great food! Awesome selections of ice cream.
Great atmosphere, friendly service, and good food.
Fantastic little spot in Mainstrauss!!
It's fun
Dang. School starts next week.
Great location, great & friendly service, great price and terrific soft serve ice cream and most variety of flavors anywhere we've been.
Best hotdogs in town
Food was excellent and the drinks are amazing
So many flavors of yummy ice cream
Best ice cream around! Soft serve chocolate peanut butter is the MVP. An amazing combination and they always deliver great customer service!
The soft serve is awesome!
Good ice cream!

Under the shade of a big tree I had the many delicious veggie burger I have ever had in my life. With a spicy restaurant made mustard sauerkraut lettuce and tomato it was a perfect sandwich. The waitress was the daughter of the two owners and she couldn’t have been more delightful. They also ave an amazing sandwich called chick a fil lie in which when you order a donation is made to an lgbt charity. Bravo!!!  (PS. And if you want to get marry there is a justice of the peace just steps away.)
My favorite place to get icecream 💛🍨🍦
They added table service this summer and it added an additional level to this lovely spot. They have really good coffee and all items are made to order. So delicious everytime

Bland food, it all looks good, but has no flavor.  To the owner, I spent about $30 ordering online and did not dine in. I ordered based off of recommendations from google, and was pretty disappointed. Thought I would leave my experience. Maybe you have great service and location, I don't know, but the food I received looked great but was just a disappointment.  Could not finish it!  Sorry if you took it personal,  but this is a place for reviews.  Nothing mean spirited about it.
Who doesnt love ice cream...

New experience, well worth the delicious breakfast sitting at a tree. Great breakfast scrambler, chili, toast with pear jam, and ginger green tea. A most enjoyable part of my day off and I met the owner, a great chef and friendly soul.
Cute place with great selection of ice cream flavors! I recommend mixing mango and papaya.

Breakfast was delicious! Everything is quality with home cooked goodness. Many choices on menu at great prices. All syrup, jams. etc made themselves. Our server Robin was very proud of their food, and rightly so! He had such a passion for the food and restaurant it was very refreshing. We stopped to have soft serve (so many flavors available) and came back for breakfast next day. Glad we did!
Husband ordered corn beef n hash the potatoes were practically raw. He had to cook them for a while once we got home.
Must try cappuccino, German chocolate, and peanut butter
Great walk up shop for great food. May I recommend the guinness chili and the pork cuban when,its available. Also pick out of hundreds of  Soft serve combinations.
No longer allowing walk up windows service? A TREMENDOUS bummer and now I don't like Piper's nearly as much as when window service was available.

Great place! Cute outdoor setup! Tasty food! Had tasty gluten free food!  Very accommodating since we showed up in the morning with a party of fifteen, for a send off brunch, for yesterday's newly married couple.

As a family of four, this has been one of our go to spots. Lovely seating outside, with plenty of shade. Located right across from a great park for the kids. They serve adult beverages (and adult shakes!!), and have tons of flavors of ice cream. Our personal favorite ice cream flavors are lime, chocolate mint, and black licorice. Their food menu rotates, and they use local ingredients. All of the above for very reasonable prices.
Our favorite place to eat ice cream!!!! And their chips and ketchup are the bomb too!!!
Absolutely wonderful ice cream and shakes. Everything is fresh and made to order. You owe it to yourself to drive to Covington and try the fabulous menu

I wanted so badly to like this!   The menu really interested me and I was excited to see malt vinegar flavoring for the fries.  I ordered on Door Dash and 32 minutes after the order was supposed to be delivered, not when I ordered it.  That's when I received a phone call from the owner saying he just received my order and was out of fries.  That's totally okay, it happens, he offered me chips or to wait until his fry delivery came in.  I opted for homemade chips.  I didn't expect to get anything for free, but the chips are cheaper than the fries and I wasn't credited for it.  Then 50 minutes after my delivery was supposed to be here I received my  order of the Chick-Fil-Lie salad sandwich, to which I added bacon and mustard.  I got it with no bacon or mustard.  It had NO flavor.  It was just awful.  I was so disappointed.  But honestly, those were the best chips I've ever had in my life!  I'll probably give them one more try to see if this wasn't a fluke, but I just didn't have a good experience.
Great little breakfast nook
Great service and awesome ice cream
Friendly, but no esspreso.
Very kind man that runs the business. Staff is polite and considerate.
Son and I visit every few days. Great treats and food. Staff if is fairly friendly most visits. Soft serve shakes and malts of every flavor. Soft serve is lactose free.

I love visiting Piper's! They have the best ice cream! You get to choose up to three different flavors to mix together with sprinkles mixed in or just on top!! Everyone need to try Piper's Cafe in Covington KY at least once!😊
My preferred spot for quality cafe food. The fool was super appetizing. The staff was very welcoming and observant. Food is similar to a place in San Francisco I loved.
Super good burgers and ice cream

This is an interesting place. Definitely memorable! A friend and I went here for brunch because there reviews were good and we'd heard good things about the food. However, no one explained to us about the seating situation. This restaurant has a walk up window to order/pick up your food. There are picnic tables outside, but since it's FREEZING, they told us about the seating upstairs. We followed the outside stairs to the floor above the kitchen. It was so super tiny. There was a pub table, a bar with a few chairs, and a loveseat. My friend and I were comfortable, but it might have been awkward/weird/crowded if anyone else had joined us in the sitting room. We were completely caught off guard. So now you know in case you're planning to go here when it's chilly outside. :)  EDIT- I want to add that this place did have really great food and I love that a lot of it is locally sourced! :)

Yummmmmmy! Potato soup was DELICIOUS. I also got french toast and it was great. My husband enjoyed his food a lot as well and the woman who helped up was so sweet. This was our first time there and we can't wait to come back during the summer for ice cream.
Great little take out with juicy burgers and homemade chips

Breakfast here was phenomenal!! The owner was extremely kind, the Goetta scrambler was great, the toast was the best I’ve ever had, and the cook even came out to help us with our patio umbrella and check on our food! If you’re in the area, be sure to check this place out!!

Staff very friendly. All the food we had was very good, especially loved the home made chips, the rat tail fries were also good. The ice cream was yummy, the selection of flavors made it hard to choose until I saw the eggnog and my wife saw the pumpkin spice.
The goetta chilli dog was delicious. All ingredients are local or made in house.
Great little place.
Ice cream so-so, but I’m not a no-dairy soft serve fan. The other items are great! Slushy Moscow mule and Kentucky mule with bits of real ginger was fantastic, as was the hot dog I got there!

The set up is adorable and the staff that was serving was incredibly friendly. The owner, clearly has an issue with taking feedback, thou it is honest.  I had great expectations after reading the reviews and speaking with the staff. However, the product was as noted “lackluster.” I expected a creamier, richer taste. That was not the case.  My 1 star rating stems from the poor reaction on behalf of the owner. Perhaps improve your business accumen and you wouldn’t be having a negative impact on your business and future business.
The ice cream here is lackluster. Lots and lots of options though to mix in to create your own flavors but it does taste artificial. Service was sweet though.

Loved this place. Great ice cream! So many flavors to choose from and maybe almost too many :) Luckily the ice cream mixologist as he called himself was there to help and make suggestions.  Would highly recommend.

Did a walking food tour several months ago and the Goetz coney that I had was amazingly delicious.  So my wife and I are heading back down to that area and will be stopping by Pipers a few times. The owner was very knowledgeable about the area and cares about his products that he serves. Update. June 26th, 2018.  So came back down to spend a few days in Kentucky and wanted to.go to Pipers because of the chili dog.  Got to.the place around 7 and the guy said.he isn't serving any food, he is tired, and was.going to.shut.down early because he was.the only one there.  So very disappointing. Drove two hours down, took a $10 uber over and got an attitude and no chili dog. Plus a $10 uber ride back to the place I was staying.  Re edit of my edit. Spoke with owner and situation is resolved.  Very nice gentleman I spoke with...
Great ice cream, enchanting atmosphere and the foods not bad either. I stop here every time i am even close to Covington.
Highly recommended!!!

This place was amazing. All day breakfast & a walk up window for ice cream. What more could you ask for. The outdoor seating is relaxing and has a beautiful view of the neighborhood. Good prices, good wait staff. Try the hamelin hash potatoes & pancakes. You will be very satisfied!
Family friendly!! And beer and wine!!

Piper's is a precious walk-up ice cream window that happens to serve breakfast all day along with a variety of dishes that are locally sourced.  They're known for their customizable soft serve flavors, in which you can choose up to three flavors for no additional charge.  I had the espresso chocolate soft serve, which didn't have a distinct coffee flavor, but it made the chocolate that much more delish. All soft-serve is lactose-free btw!!! The kitchen was remarkably clean from what I could see from the window, and I visited an hour before closing.  There is seating on the deck to left as well as indoor seating above the kitchen.  My only complaint is that there's no option for a twist cone because of the flavor combo shindig, and ya girl loves a good twist cone.

Can't beat Piper's when it comes to ice cream in greater Cincinnati. Nothing fancy, just delicious vanilla soft serve blended or swirled with a ton of flavors to choose from. The ice cream has that awesome grainy texture that I love from great soft serve places. Get a cup blended with peanut butter, banana and rainbow sprinkles. You'll savor every bite. Location is awesome too and the guy at the window is always helpful and a total character.
great food but didnt feel welcomed. the white man who i believe is the owner was rude!
I love Piper's! Some of the best food I've had in the area! Friendly staff, eco friendly everything! Best local restaurant I've been too and it's affordable! I love coming here!
An enjoyable place to grab a refreshing dessert

The walk up ice cream window is great.  Good soft serve with a ton of flavoring options.  My 6 year old nephew thinks the endless flavor combinations are the best thing in the world next to the actual ice cream.  This is a great area to bring the family for a walk and a fun treat.
Congratulations to the Harris'
Great soft ice cream in over 40 flavors.
Sunday Breakfast!
Went here for breakfast. Food was AMAZING. Had the French toast and bacon, couldn't have asked for a better meal
Great small business with great ownership. It's nice to have a happy place in this part of Covington.
Can't get better than icecream, beer, breakfast, and hotdogs!
Delicious big portions of breakfast and full menu all day. Beautiful outdoor venue.
One of the few truly family-friendly spots in Mainstrasse Village.
Great menu with good vegetarian options. Great soft serve with 100 flavors !
Okay
Perfection
Great burger and biscuits.

Unique experience. The older gentleman wasn't the friendliest but spoons, the cook was a delight. He made up where the older man was lacking. I had the burger and it was good and the ketchup was amazing
Quaint in the heart pf Mainsrasse
Good ice cream. Wish there were indoor seating.
Great ice cream and tasty dogs!! Highly recommend.
Amazing service, delicious food and very accommodating!!!  A great place for lunch, dinner or drinks!
The food is good, ice cream is great, and service is fantastic.
Superior service and delicious treats!  So many flavors of soft serve and healthy lunch options!
I liked it
Beef sandwich, must try!
Amazing breakfast. Amazing service.
My favorite place to eat
Excellent menu. Food is delicious and the ice cream menu is unreal. So many delicious choices.

WOW, outstanding!!!  Had the biscuits & gravy with lamb sausage ... awesome.  The herb biscuit really makes it unique.  Rat tail fries are excellent as are the freshly made potato chips ... amazing!!!!  Great accommodations for those with gluten allergies.  Great service with a smile.  We will be back.
Excellent. Slushy drinks are wonderful. Great place.
Perfect setting, delicious food made to order. 68 flavors of made all natural soft serve ice cream.  It's addictingly wonderful.
Pleasantly impressed
Vegan friendly!! (Emphasis on the 'friendly')

You won't be sorry if you stop here - it's a bonus if it's nice weather and you get to eat outside, since it's in such a nice area of Covington.  The food is SOOO good, and served by the happiest man in the world (Brandon).  There was a breakfast place right across from our hotel, but we made the better choice by walking to Piper's. We had biscuits, scrambler with lamb sausage, and oatmeal with dried fruit add-ins - all delicious,  plus bonuses of homemade butter and local jellies.  Loved every bite!
Hands down my favourite place to eat in Covington. Amazing, consistent staff with great attitudes and delicious food that's always fresh and flavorful.

Stopped in since my hotel was nearby. Google led me here and Wow I was not disappointed. Everything made from scratch. Ketchup was best I've ever had. Didn't even need it cause breakfast potatoes were so tasty but it really set it off. Biscuits and pork gravy home made deliciousness. Can't wait to swing by Cinci again to come back to Pipers.
Awesome place!!
I always enjoy sitting outside at Piper's.  I have never had anything I did not enjoy, but today the grilled cheese and tomato sandwich really hit the spot!
Great unique place
Amazing breakfast. Everything is made from scratch, even the ketchup. Great farm to table food with mainly local ingredients.

Everything is delicious. Great local meats and Kenny's Farmhouse cheese (smoked gouda is absolute perfection). The jams for the bread are so stupid good. I am literally happier and more complete as a human being when I am finished eating here. Ice cream is good too.

Spacious, beautiful outdoor area that allows dogs, friendly and informative staff who even brought my dog out a treat. Hands down the best french toast I've ever had and the coffee was some of the best I've had as well.  I will definitely be back to try their ice cream (lactose-free, so also dog friendly!) soon!
Very robust menu, full of vegetarian alternatives that are delicious. Insane variety of ice creams as well. Friendly and knowledgeable staff as well

Ten out of ten would recommend. And I haven't even had their ice cream yet, which looks awesome. They know what they are and execute on it perfectly. The biscuits and gravy were obviously homemade and absolutely delicious. The pancake was one of the best I've had in Cincinnati. And that uncured bacon is worth every penny. Absolutely delicious. I can't wait to return, this place is wonderful.
Good stuff I'll be back
Best soft serve in Cincinnati.   The chili is excellent.

Nice quaint place.  All soft serve flavors mixed by order.  Standard soft serve, with a great variety.  Also a great diner-esque food menu.  Good for a quick stop.  Pretty good gluten-free burger, along with the gluten free menu in general!
This is literally the BEST icecream place I have EVER been to!!! I highly recommend the Apple Pie Icecream in the waffle cone. Ugh! I think I might go get another one right now!

Fantastic. Had pancakes and sausage and biscuits and gravy and sourdough with strawberry mango jam, and the scrambler with sausage and colby. All of it was wonderful. Oh, and the gentleman who took our order and made our food was wonderful, giving us recommendations on his favorites and answering our questions. Loved it.
Very nice ice cream don't miss it
Great breakfast, great service, love the relaxed outdoor atmosphere.

Great ice cream and great atmosphere. I was not a fan of the chili or fries, but that is just my opinion. All of the other food looked good. . The staff is very friendly and helpful.  I look forward to trying it again in the near future.

EXCELLENT little gem for food any day of the week, but I really adore the place for their breakfasts on the weekends.  They offer an all you can eat pancake option which breaks even after 4 pancakes.  Their pancakes, as well as hot chocolate and ice cream are all done with lactose free options so Dairy Free people rejoice!  They even have a puppy icecream option.  So much of their choices are locally sourced, and they can even deliver locally.
Got one of their locally sourced hand crafted burgers for takeout today, WOW. One of the best burgers I've had in Cincy. Highly recommended at a good price
Locally sourced with an awesome menu!
Excellent food!   Reasonably-priced,  extremely tasty, and neat outdoor ambience.  Proprietor was very willing to explain the menu and is proud of the fact that everything is sourced locally.
